title: Musashi no Ken
synopsis: Musashi no Ken is the story of a boy named Musashi who aims to be the Kendo champion.  Part of the anime is him as a child, and part is of him as an adult.
voices: ['Horikawa, Ryo', 'Ikura, Kazue', 'Tomizawa, Michie', 'Kondou, Reiko', 'Tobita, Nobuo', 'Tsunoda, Narumi', 'Kitou, Satoko', 'Narahashi, Miki', 'Kitou, Satoko']
staff: [['Tsunoda, Toshitaka', ['Director']], ['Kinoshita, Yuuki', ['Episode Director', ' Animation Director']], ['Tonokatsu, Hideki', ['Episode Director']], ['Asada, Yuuji', ['Episode Director']]]
